transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan, Abhijit ji?
Customer: Haan, kaun?
Executive: Aap aap Facebook se bol raha hun. Abhijit bol rahe hain kya? Facebook se bol raha hun Odisha se.
Customer: Kahan se?
Executive: Odisha se Facebook bol raha hun.
Customer: Haan haan sir, boliye.
Executive: Haan, to abhi jo dashboard open karke kuch mil sakta hai kya jo jaise ho sakta hai.
Customer: Aapne call kiya tha na abhi?
Executive: Haan, sir, ek minute. Aapne kaun se number se call kiya hai aapne?
Executive: Haan, main ye to 2233 number se.
Customer: 2233 ek minute rukiye main aapko call back karti hun.
Executive: Koi baat nahi.
summary:
Concerns:

- Request to open the dashboard to see what is possible.



Resolution:

- Executive asked the customer which number he called from.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will call back.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

facebook call, dashboard
